title: Ayyappa Swamy Seva Committee

hero.title: Swamiye Saranam Ayyappa
hero.description: Welcome to the official site of the sacred Ayyappa Swamy Temple, Lakshmeshwar-582116. Currently under construction, your blessings and support help build this divine space.

suprabhatha.title: Suprabhatha Seva
suprabhatha.description: Early morning prayer and chanting to wake the deity.

abhishekam.title: Abhishekam
abhishekam.description: Sacred bathing ceremony with milk, honey, and holy water.

archana.title: Archana & Aarti
archana.description: Offering flowers and waving camphor flame to the deity.

maha.title: Maha Pooja
maha.description: Main pooja with special mantras and prasad distribution.

deeparadhana.title: Deeparadhana
deeparadhana.description: Evening pooja with oil lamps and chanting.

harathi.title: Harathi & Temple Close
harathi.description: Final blessing of the day before closing the temple.

footer.templeDescription: Swamiye Saranam Ayyappa. A divine place of worship and peace.
footer.subscribePrompt: Get temple updates in your inbox
footer.rights: Ayyappa Swamy Temple. All rights reserved.
